credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Study of Drapery "Fortune"
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: Black crayon, pencil, white and yellow chalks, on purple paper
description: Study of drapery beneath the feet of the figure; below: Study of drapery. Signed and inscribed, lower left: "E. Vedder drapery / study for "Fortune" owned / by Charles Keck."
